description: Main entry point and root widget for a Flutter notes application. Sets up providers, theme, and initial screen.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: StatelessWidget that sets up theme, state management, and routing for the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the root NotesApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing theme and state to child widgets.
